name: Zone Control
description:
Zone control François Zapletal and Aymeric Pichon  
Description:  
Zone control is a 1-on-1 game played on the same computer that is played on a 1920 x 1080 screen (16: 9 resolution)
The game consists of going to the central area (the green circle in the center of the map) As soon as a player passes over the area, 
the area will change its color to that of the player who is passing over it and a bar and percentage will increase. 
The first player to hold the zone to reach 100% wins the game. The player will therefore try to keep the zone or take it back from the opponent by going over it.  
For this they can shoot themselves (kill the opponent who will reappear a few seconds later). Players can also collect coins to buy potions in the "shop" to boost their abilities for a limited time. 
They can also hide and play with the walls to win. Since there are not two mice on a computer for aiming, there is an automatic aiming system. 
Orders :  
Blue player: 
- d: go right 
- g: go left 
- r: go up 
- f: go down 
- space: shoot 
- h: open and close the shop 
- e: buy shield potion 
- t: buy potion of life 
- c: buy speed potion 
- v: buy damage potion  
Red player: 
- right arrow: go right 
- left arrow: go left 
- up arrow: go up 
- down arrow: go down 
- the point of the numeric keypad: shoot 
- + of the numeric keypad: open and close the shop 
- 2 from the numeric keypad: buy shield potion 
- 1 from the numeric keypad: buy potion of life 
- 3 from the numeric keypad: buy speed potion 
- 4 from the numeric keypad: buy damage potion
